supply.supply_status: Adequate - Auto-transportable division deployed Libya-Tunisia border June 1940 during Italian invasion of France. Fuel reserves 4 days for partial motorization (enough to move portion of division), ammunition 7 days, water 24.5L/man/day (180,000L total / 7,350 personnel), food 10 days. Mixed motor/animal transport. Supply base: Misrata. Commander Vincenzo Della Mura.
